channel.title: Dolby on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Dolby on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: The new Dolby Vision 2 HDR standard is probably going to be controversial
item.description: It addresses two scourges of modern TV viewing—but maybe not in the way we want.

item.title: Hrithik Roshan, NTR’s ‘War 2’ to Become First Indian Film in Dolby Cinema (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: Yash Raj Films (YRF) is set to make cinematic history when “War 2” becomes the first Indian film to screen in Dolby Cinema in India, with the Hindi and Telugu-language action sequel slated

item.title: Hrithik Roshan, NTR’s ‘War 2’ to Become First Indian Film in Dolby Cinema (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: Yash Raj Films (YRF) is set to make cinematic history when “War 2” becomes the first Indian film to screen in Dolby Cinema in India, with the Hindi and Telugu-language action sequel slated
